channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report E-2025030027
item.description:
Report E-2025030027

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-01
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: DRIVER ENTERED THE LOADING AREA WITH INTERNAL VALVE OPEN, EXTERNAL VALVE OPEN AND WASHOUT CAP OFF. ALL SHOULD HAVE BEEN CLOSED. STARTED LOADING WHEN PRODUCT SPILLED INTO CONTAINMENT AREA. CLEANED UP SPILL BY SHIPPER
